Title: Relates to requiring the establishment of automatic payment plans
Summary: Relates to requiring the establishment of automatic payment plans; requires investor owned combination utility companies headquartered in New York to establish a statewide program to provide eligible participants with affordability payment plans.
LawCode: Add ยง66-t, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the establishment of automatic payment plans
